text: Aur aisa hi hoga (jaisa tu nay khwab mein dekha hai ke) tera Rubb tujhey (apne kaam ke liye) muntakhab(choose) karega aur tumhey baaton ki teh tak pahunchna sikhayega aur tere upar aur aale Yaqub par apni niyamat usi tarah poori karega jis tarah issey pehle woh tere buzurgon , Ibrahim aur Ishaq par kar chuka hai, yaqeenan tera Rubb aleem (All-Knowing)-o-hakeem hai (All-Wise)â€
